phrases.question: I can take you to the airport.
answers: Will you be going that way?

phrases.question: Shall I say hello to her?
answers: Will you be writing to her?

phrases.question: Marion and Jimmy can stay up late tonight.
answers: Will they be waiting for me?

phrases.question: He won't be there at ten o'clock
answers: Will he be signing the new contract?

phrases.question: There won't be enough oil in a couple of decades.
answers: What will we be using instead?

phrases.question: This time next week I'll be in Madrid.
answers: Will you be staying at a hotel?

phrases.question: Don't ring Sue up at 6 o'clock
answers: Will she be bathing her baby?
